meta.name: viewport
meta.title: Dudley Street Neighborhood Charter School - BPE, Inc.

meta.content: Dudley Street Neighborhood Charter School - BPE, Inc.

Founded in 2012 by BPE, in partnership with Dudley Street Neighborhood Initiative, we serve 325 scholars in grades K1-5. We graduate resilient, hard-working scholars who are proficient readers, writers, problem solvers, and thinkers. We have organized our school to ensure each individual student reaches these goals. Every graduate of the Dudley Street School will be on a path to attend college…

meta.content: Founded in 2012 by BPE, in partnership with Dudley Street Neighborhood Initiative, we serve 325 scholars in grades K1-5. Every graduate of the Dudley Street School will be on a path to attend college…

div.p: Our mission is to provide a world class education for all students, preparing them for long term academic success and responsible civic engagement; to serve as a driver of human & social capital development, preparing outstanding new teachers to drive excellent student outcomes throughout Boston; and to serve as a partner in catalyzing improvement of all schools in the Dudley area.

div.p: BTR and DPC are proud to be AmeriCorps programs.
